metaTitle: Ordering Major - Professional hair care cosmetics
metaDescription: Place an order for Major professional hair care cosmetics. Select the products, enter your details, choose the delivery and payment method to receive high-quality products for the health of your hair.
paragraph1: Our cosmetics are already whispering among themselves about who will be the first to visit you.
paragraph2: As soon as we see the payment, we will contact you during business hours from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.
paragraph3: If it takes a little longer, please know that we haven't disappeared, we're just somewhere deep in boxes and bubble wrap.
paymentErrorParagraph1: It seems that something went wrong during the payment.
paymentErrorParagraph2: Don't worry — your order hasn't disappeared. Try paying again or check your card details.
NumberOfItemsInTheCart: Number of items in the cart:
name: Name
telegramParagraph: If you want to receive an order confirmation in Telegram
availableOnlyOnTheTerritoryOfUkraine: (Available only on the territory of Ukraine)
youCanPickItUpAtTheAddress: You can pick it up at the address:
paymentFirstTitle: How to pay for the order?
paymentFirstParagraph: We work through payment to an individual entrepreneur, but we have made it simple and convenient for you. Choose:
partialPaymentDescription: So that we can start collecting the order specifically for you.
fullPaymentDescription: This way your order will be sent to you even faster.
paymentCheckbox: I agree to the processing of personal data
youMustAgreeToTheProcessingOfPersonalDat: You must agree to the processing of personal data
